resources.string: Question 1: In what year was the first officially recognised Test match played?
Question 2: Name the two Sri Lankan Batsman who made the highest test partnership in Test Cricket in 2006
Question 3: Name the players who took over 20 wickets in the 2005 ashes series
Question 4: Ian Botham scored 149 not out to set up a win against Australia in the 1981 ashes Series. Name the ground where this was scored.
Question 5: Sachin Tendulkar is widely regarded as the greatest Batsman of all time. How many test centuries did he score for India?
Question 6: Name the two all-rounders below who have scored over 8000 runs and taken over 200 wickets
Question 7: The home ground of the MCC, the ECB and Middlesex County Cricket Ground, commonly called "The home of cricket" is called:
Question 8: Who is the leading wicket taker in Test Match cricket?
